channel.title: Dam's Blog
channel.description: this is a blog where will record my life, feelings, experence, etc :)

item.title: Understand parallelism and concurrence
item.description: Concurrency and parallelism are NOT the same thing, concurrency is often referred to as a property of a program or system, while prallelism is ofen cited to represent a behavior of a execution.

item.title: Personal collection for C
item.description: This article is about some my study notes, and I write down these for preventing forgetting when want to ues, and maybe this page is useful for your work or interview of your ideal work or study for C, or not.

item.title: n must be congruent to 0 or 1 mod 4 in an n-vertex self-complementary graph
item.link: http://www.dam.moe/computer science/n must be congruent to 0 or 1 mod 4 in an n-vertex self-complementary graph.html
item.description: complement graph : the complement or inverse of a graph G is a graph H on the same vertices such that two distinct vertices of H are adjacent if and only if they are not adjacent in G, it means that one fills in all the missing edges required to form a complete graph, and removes all the edges that were previously there...
item.guid: http://www.dam.moe/computer science/n must be congruent to 0 or 1 mod 4 in an n-vertex self-complementary graph.html

item.title: Don't start to learn a programming language by reading spec
item.link: http://www.dam.moe/computer science/Don't start to learn a programming language by reading spec.html
item.description: I met some people who always recommend me to read the language spec to start learn a language when I am a newbie in programming. it is a pity I do not continue following their so called recommendation after sevral tries. because I felt that so hard for me at that time. fortunately I also met some people who gave me the really useful advice so that...
item.guid: http://www.dam.moe/computer science/Don't start to learn a programming language by reading spec.html

item.title: why is MD5 impossible to invert in theory, explaining by math
item.link: http://www.dam.moe/computer science/why is MD5 impossible to invert in theory, explaining by math.html
item.description: We usually hear that MD5 could not be inverted to get the input value by the hash value, because it is well know thing, however have you known why that? whether it can be proved formally? MD5 is a kind of hash function to get fixed length hash value, and they are easily to be proved they can not be inverted in theory, owe it all to the prove method of existence of an inverse of an original function...
item.guid: http://www.dam.moe/computer science/why is MD5 impossible to invert in theory, explaining by math.html
